meanings.definition: To make known publicly or officially
meanings.sent1: The teacher will announce the winner of the spelling bee.
meanings.sent2: The mayor will announce the new city project tomorrow.
meanings.sent3: The parrot learned to announce visitors with a loud squawk.
meanings.sent4: The ringing bells announce the arrival of the train.
meanings.sent5: The breaking news bulletin will announce the important update.

meanings.sent1: The president will announce the new policy changes.
meanings.sent2: The referee will announce the winner of the match.
meanings.sent3: The magician likes to announce his tricks with flair.
meanings.sent4: The thunderstorm announces its arrival with dark clouds.
meanings.sent5: The town crier will announce the royal decree in the square.

meanings.definition: To give notice of; to make known; to publish; to proclaim
meanings.sent1: The company will announce the launch of their new product line.
meanings.sent2: The radio host will announce the upcoming music festival.
meanings.sent3: The town crier likes to announce the daily news with enthusiasm.
meanings.sent4: The bright colors of the sunrise announce the start of a new day.
meanings.sent5: The loudspeaker will announce the emergency evacuation instructions.
